title: Something Funny
subTitle: Summer 2013
role: Lead Developer for this Teletoon Summer promotion, where users rated a series of weekly clips to enter a contest.

items: Time-based navigation that automatically revealed new clips at the beginning of a week
Sequenced video voting whereby the user would watch a video and then choose if they liked it or not
User-choices were collected and stored in order to show the most, and least, funny videos after entering the contest
